items.sentence: Tom and Mary were playing tennis this morning.
Tom asked me who I thought would win the race.
I assure you I\'ll accept full responsibility.
I believe you, but unfortunately Tom doesn\'t.
It\'s a pity that Tom couldn\'t be here today.
I think that you can guess what happened next.
I think you ought to let Tom do what he wants.
I thought Tom had answered all your questions.
I thought you said Tom used to live in Boston.
Tom never told me he didn\'t know how to swim.
